page.title: 18LIFE IN THE 80'S
page.content: People live in organised communities. The adults work five days a week and most of the money goes towards family and household needs. Clothes are a growing trend.They have popular makers and are very expensive. Children,if given a choice,will go for a certain make,e.g.Slazenger and Nike. The main hobbies are stamp collecting, netball and soccer.These are only some of the most popular ones but there are lots more. The most popular games are cricket, football,rounders,hockey and hide and seek.All of these games require running or quick movements.The people who play these games are mainly enegetic. The favourite foods are popcorn,chips and crisps.The manufacturers make enough money to expand each year.
